title: Wind Chill
description: Two college students sharing a ride home during the winter holidays find their car broken down on a lonely snowy road - the tension rises when they realize that they may not be alone in this claustrophobic thriller!
details: {"Audio languages": ["English"], "Subtitles": ["English [CC]"], "Directors": ["Gregory Jacobs"], "Producers": ["Graham Broadbent", "Ben Cosgrove", "Peter Czernin"], "Starring": ["Emily Blunt", "Ashton Holmes", "Martin C. Donovan"]}
